attributes.action: Take action to stop the Immigration Health Surcharge increase to £624/year
attributes.additional_details: The last decade has seen a dramatic change in Immigration Laws, mostly restricting and punishing Non-EEA Immigrants who moved here in search for a better life. The IHS Immigration Health Surcharge is one of them, and since introduced, it has taken over £900 Millions from most immigrants' pocket. The increase of the IHS from £400 to £624 per year will require any Non-EEA Immigrants to pay a minimum mandatory £2,052.60 despite their age,vulnerability to extend their stay and keep their family safe
attributes.background: We want the Parliament to stop and scrap this bill forever, it is unfair toward the Non-EEA Immigrants who already contribute to the economy.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307321
